title: Reusable React Custom Form Component
description: In this challenge you will be developing a reusable custom form aka submit form in React with functional component in which you can add as much input fields and buttons as you want by sending them as props. You can use that SINGLE component in your future projects too to have login form, registration form or a data creation/updation form for any CRUD functionality.

meta.title: Reusable Custom Form | React Functional Component | CRUD Form
meta.description: Learn how to develop a reusable custom form in React using functional components. Create login, registration, or data creation/update forms for your projects.
meta.keywords: React, Custom Form, Functional Component, CRUD, Login, Registration

i18n.title: 可复用的 React 自定义表单组件
i18n.description: 在这个挑战中，你将使用函数式组件在 React 中开发一个可复用的自定义表单，也就是提交表单。通过将输入字段和按钮作为属性传递，你可以根据需要添加任意数量的输入字段和按钮。在未来的项目中，你也可以使用这个单一组件来创建登录表单、注册表单或用于任何 CRUD 功能的数据创建/更新表单。
